name: Save the Dungeon!
description:
Welcome to Save the Dungeon!



Heroes are invading your home, they aim to take everything you have. They have declared you evil Overlord as a justification to desecrate your land and end your life. It is time to call forth your minions and prepare the Dungeon for war! We stand with you Overlord to prove to these “heroes” that you are revered as the Overlord of these lands for a reason!

Save the Dungeon! is a top down tower defense game where you must summon your minions to defend the dungeon from a horde of heroes! There is three levels implemented in the game with two different overlords to choose from and 6 different minion types to summon!

Features
Buy new items and upgrade existing ones in the shop!



Summon Dangerous Minions



Will you show the so called heroes why you are the Overlord or will you allow them to extinguish life and rob your home?
